inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of acromegaly from pituitary adenoma visualized by MRI
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI reveals a macroadenoma with no invasion

inclusion.criterion: elevated IGF-1 levels compared to age and gender matched control values
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Laboratory evaluation in the fasting state reveals IGF-1 of 968 ng/mL

inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: no mention of OGTT or GH response

inclusion.criterion: already agreed to undergo surgical resection of pituitary adenoma prior to study entry
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: She is on stable doses of octreotide LAR since her diagnosis was confirmed

inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: no mention of patient providing informed consent

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: no mention of intercurrent medical or psychiatric illness

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: She is married and has 2 children, using IUD as contraceptive method

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: no mention of patient using insulin

exclusion.criterion: use of estrogen, progesterone, testosterone or thyroid hormone
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: She is on stable doses of octreotide LAR

notes: Patient has history of acne and mild hirsutism, elevated testosterone levels, gradual enlargement of hands and feet, irregular menstrual cycle, nipple discharge, snoring, headache, facial features of acromegaly and prognathism. Laboratory evaluation reveals IGF-1 of 968 ng/mL and random GH of 19.7 ng/mL.
